scripts.compile:sass:production: yarn run clear:styles && node-sass public/styles/main.scss public/styles/style.css -w --output-style compressed
scripts.s3:deploy: aws s3 cp public/ s3://jaimemendoza.com/ --recursive --profile jmendoza
scripts.nu:clear: rm -rfv node_modules && rm -rfv package-lock.json && rm -rfv yarn.lock && yarn install
